cyclone.name: IRMA
cyclone.current_location: about 65 miles E of Varadero, Cuba and 145 miles SE of Key West, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: expected to turn NW later today and then NNW on Sunday, tracking across the Florida Keys Sunday morning and up the southwest coast of Florida thereafter

weather_observation.watch_coast: None for PortMiami; hurricane watch area begins north of Fernandina Beach to Edisto Beach and west of the Aucilla River to Indian Pass
weather_observation.warning_coast: Fernandina Beach southward around the Florida peninsula to the Aucilla River, including the Florida Keys, Lake Okeechobee and Florida Bay
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Entire Florida east coast including Miami, the Florida Keys, and southwest Florida coastline
weather_observation.wind: Hurricane-force winds possible with gusts over 74 mph; 34-kt probability 94% and 50-kt probability 44% at the port
weather_observation.storm_surge: 4–6 ft inundation possible from North Miami Beach to Card Sound Bridge, including Biscayne Bay
weather_observation.rainfall: 8–15 inches possible over the southeast Florida peninsula, locally higher
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous surf/rip currents and a few tornadoes possible in outer rain-bands
